title: Senganthal Kaiyaale Lyrics Rowthiram Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Haricharan
Lyrics: Lalith Anand 
Music: Prakash Nkki
Song: Senganthal Kaiyaale
Movie: Rowthiram

Senganthal Kaiyaale, uyirai thottu ponal
Oru senthoora aagaayam, kannil thandhu ponal
Oyaadha poothooral, Ulle ootri ponal
Aval thozhsaayindhu naan pesa, aasai mootu ponal
Palagiya naatkal ellame, ahzgaai maatri ponale
Palamurai avalai paarthaalum, adanga aaval koduthale

Eeram, manadhoram, nadhi nadhiena thaana vandhaal
Dhooram vegu thooram,oru ahzayena thaana theendi chendral

Senganthal Kaiyaale, uyirai thottu ponal
Oru senthoora aagaayam, kannil thandhu ponal
Oyaadha poothooral, Ulle ootri ponal
Aval thozhsaayindhu naan pesa, aasai mootu ponal

Edho pola aanen, yedhanaale maari ponen
Eman pole kollum paarvai
Ennai urasumpodhum uyir vazhkiren
Ada yaarai thaandum pozhudhum, Edhum thondridathu
Avalai paarkum pozhuthu
Emn kaalgal thaandi pogathu

Netru paartha nila ettaadha thooram thooram
Yeno yeno indru en kaigal neetum thooram 
Kaatril pogum ilai aanene aeno naanum
Thooki ponaaii ennai engeyo ponen naanum

Thaedi dhinam thaedi, 
udai udithidum maatram Thandhaal thandhaal
Mayam idhu thaano, 
en nizhalukum vannam en vandhadho..

Kootam koodum saalai, viral korthu pogum velai
Palar paarthu pogum pothum, adhu 
Thanimai pola en thondrutho
Aval koondhal aada thaane, thozhil medai ketpem
Melidhaai theendum podhu, 
Siridhaaga garvam kolvene

Theeyil seitha kangal en nenjai yetti paarkum
Poovil neitha keigal ethotho ennai ketkum
Vaanavilin 7zhu vanamthaan saayam pogum
Vellai megam aval ellora thooru pogum

Eeram, manadhoram, nadhi nadhiena thaana vandhaal
Dhooram vegu thooram,oru ahzayena thaana theendi chendral

Palagiya naatkal ellame, ahzgaai maatri ponale
Palamurai avalai paarthaalum, adanga aaval koduthale

Vaanam, adhan thaagam, 
kadal kudithidum kaalam vandhaal vandhaal
Neram, veguneram
udan nadhidum aasai thandhaal thandhaal

Senganthal Kaiyaale, uyirai thottu ponal
Oru senthoora aagaayam, kannil thandhu ponal
Oyaadha poothooral, Ulle ootri ponal
Aval thozhsaayindhu naan pesa, aasai mootu ponal


Rowthiram Lyrics
